snap(0,0,0)
sky(200,200,255)
ground(240,240,240)
polys(255,255,255)
texture(250,250,250,0)
mountains(50000)
fadefrom(0)
name(Madness On Ice)
nlaps(1)

set(77,0,0,-2000000000,0)

set(47,0,0,250,0)

chk(40,0,0,250,90)
chk(40,0,0,250,0)
chk(40,0,0,250,90)
chk(40,0,0,250,0)
chk(40,0,0,250,90)
chk(40,0,0,250,0)
chk(40,0,0,250,90)
chk(40,0,0,250,0)

set(24,0,11000,250,0)pf
set(15,0,8200,250,0)p
set(24,0,5400,250,180)
set(35,0,5400,250,0)pr
set(35,0,-5400,250,0)
set(24,0,-5400,250,0)p
set(16,0,-8200,250,180)p
set(24,0,-11000,250,180)p

fix(41,0,0,-1000,90)
fix(41,0,0,-1000,0)

set(24,-11000,0,250,90)
set(15,-8200,0,250,90)
set(24,-5400,0,250,-90)
set(35,-5400,0,250,90)
set(35,5400,0,250,90)
set(24,5400,0,250,90)
set(15,8200,0,250,90)
set(24,11000,0,250,-90)

set(23,9000,9000,250,90)
set(23,9000,9000,250,-90)
set(37,9000,9000,250,0)
set(37,9000,9000,250,90)

set(23,9000,-9000,250,-90)
set(23,9000,-9000,250,90)
set(37,9000,-9000,250,0)
set(37,9000,-9000,250,90)

set(23,-9000,-9000,250,90)
set(23,-9000,-9000,250,-90)
set(37,-9000,-9000,250,0)
set(37,-9000,-9000,250,90)

set(23,-9000,9000,250,-90)
set(23,-9000,9000,250,90)
set(37,-9000,9000,250,0)
set(37,-9000,9000,250,90)


set(33,0,-9000,250,0)
set(33,9000,0,250,90)
set(33,-9000,0,250,90)
set(33,0,-9000,250,90)
set(33,9000,0,250,0)
set(33,-9000,0,250,0)

maxb(2,2400,-2400)
maxt(2,-2400,-2400)
maxl(2,2400,-2400)
maxr(2,-2400,-2400)

maxb(6,-12000,-12000)
maxt(6,12000,-12000)
maxr(6,12000,-12000)
maxl(6,-12000,-12000)
